metadata.dc:author: Matute de Cárdenas, J A
metadata.dc:description: The number of patients with laryngotracheal disorders is small but they have great importance because they produce anxiety in parents and they have a considerable morbi-mortality rate. We present the state of the art in three groups of patients: subglottic stenosis, tracheobroncomalacia and tracheal stenosis.
metadata.dc:title: Avances en cirugía laringotraqueal.
[Progress in laryngotracheal surgery].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cirugia pediatrica : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Cirugia Pediatrica
